title: Lip Cream
sinopse:
Collection of three short stories:

• Lip Cream

• Nagareboshi Iri Chocolate Cake (Chocolate Cake Made with Shooting Stars) - Machida Yuuki asks her close friend Hiro to help her bake a chocolate cake for her crush, because even though Hiro is a guy he is an incredible pastry chef! But who is Hiro's Valentine's Day crush...?

-   ShoujoMagic

• Pocket Bell
